sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯來幾杯，過會紛紛睡倒在沙發上了。

sentences.english: After dinner, woman cooed some suggestive little sighs and slipped invitingly into bed.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，女人含情脈脈，楚楚動人的躺到牀上。

sentences.english: Kate made pasta and roasted red pepper sauce for supper.
sentences.chinese: 凱特爲晚飯做了意式面及烤紅辣椒醬。

sentences.english: Why dont we have dinner together to celebrate the success of our first deal.
sentences.chinese: 咱們一起喫晚飯，慶祝我們的首次交易成功，好不好？

sentences.english: He used to bathe in the sea after supper.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，他經常去海中泡水取涼。

sentences.english: After supper, Cliff spread out his books before him to start reviewing his lessons.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後克里夫把書本攤在面前開始複習功課。

sentences.english: After dinner, my friends in Thailand told us to go to a club for some fun.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，泰國的一班朋友叫我們到的士高玩。

sentences.english: Would the rest of the students really be willing to sit for that long waiting to eat?
sentences.chinese: 其他學生會在那裏空等那麼久才喫得上晚飯麼？

sentences.english: Not coming back until evening, she would just come back to prepare suppers for me.
sentences.chinese: 直到晚上纔回來，她剛回來就會爲我準備晚飯。

sentences.english: After dinner my father oftens dozes in his chair for a while.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後，我的父親常在他的椅子上小睡片刻。

sentences.english: We knock off at 5 0'clock for supper.
sentences.chinese: 我們五點鐘歇工喫晚飯。

sentences.english: When do you want to eat dinner?
Dinner-time, and still no Hundreds of people.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯時間到了，“數以百計的人”仍然沒有出現。

sentences.english: I do hope you’ll stay for dinner with us.
sentences.chinese: 我真的希望你能留下來和我們一起喫晚飯。

sentences.english: It's time for supper, Mr. Smith. Shall we hxdye dinner together this evening?
sentences.chinese: 是晚飯時間了，史密斯先生，我們共進晚餐好嗎？

definition: to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to finish class/to get out of class
to give a dinner party/to entertain guests/to invite to dinner
